member.name: T:BfshaLibrary.BfshaFile
member.summary: Represents a NintendoWare for Cafe (NW4F) graphics data archive file.

member.name: M:BfshaLibrary.BfshaFile.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:BfshaLibrary.BfshaFile.#ctor(System.IO.Stream,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class from the given which is optionally left open.
member.param: The to load the data from.
true to leave the stream open after reading, otherwise false.

member.name: M:BfshaLibrary.BfshaFile.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class from the file with the given .
member.param: The name of the file to load the data from.

member.name: P:BfshaLibrary.BfshaFile.VersionMajor
member.summary: Gets or sets the revision of the BFRES structure formats.

member.name: P:BfshaLibrary.BfshaFile.ByteOrder
member.summary: Gets the byte order in which data is stored. Must be the endianness of the target platform.

member.name: P:BfshaLibrary.BfshaFile.Alignment
member.summary: Gets or sets the alignment to use for raw data blocks in the file.

member.name: P:BfshaLibrary.BfshaFile.DataAlignment
member.summary: Gets or sets the data alignment to use for raw data blocks in the file.

member.name: P:BfshaLibrary.BfshaFile.TargetAddressSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the target adress size to use for raw data blocks in the file.

member.name: P:BfshaLibrary.BfshaFile.Flag
member.summary: Gets or sets the flag. Unknown purpose.

member.name: P:BfshaLibrary.BfshaFile.BlockOffset
member.summary: Gets or sets the BlockOffset.

member.name: P:BfshaLibrary.BfshaFile.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets a name describing the contents.

member.name: P:BfshaLibrary.BfshaFile.Path
member.summary: Gets or sets the path of the file which originally supplied the data of this instance.

member.name: P:BfshaLibrary.BfshaFile.RelocationTable
member.summary: Gets or sets the stored (_RLT) instance.

member.name: P:BfshaLibrary.BfshaFile.ShaderModels
member.summary: Gets or sets the stored (FMDL) instances.

member.name: P:BfshaLibrary.BfshaFile.ShaderModelDict
member.summary: Gets or sets attached names

member.name: M:BfshaLibrary.BfshaFile.Save(System.IO.Stream,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Saves the contents in the given and optionally leaves it open
member.param: The to save the contents into.
true to leave the stream open after writing, otherwise false.

member.summary: Saves the contents in the file with the given .
member.param: The name of the file to save the contents into.

member.name: T:BfshaLibrary.AnimCurve
member.summary: Represents an animation curve used by several sections to control different parameters over time.

member.name: P:BfshaLibrary.AnimCurve.FrameType
member.summary: Gets or sets the data type in which are loaded and saved. For simplicity, the class always stores frames as converted instances.

member.name: P:BfshaLibrary.AnimCurve.KeyType
member.summary: Gets or sets the data type in which are loaded and saved. For simplicity, the class always stores frames as converted instances.

member.name: P:BfshaLibrary.AnimCurve.CurveType
member.summary: Gets or sets the curve type, determining the number of elements stored with each key.

member.name: P:BfshaLibrary.AnimCurve.AnimDataOffset
member.summary: Gets or sets the memory offset relative to the start of the corresponding animation data structure to animate the field stored at that address. Note that enums exist in the specific animation which map offsets to names.

member.name: P:BfshaLibrary.AnimCurve.StartFrame
member.summary: Gets or sets the first frame at which a key is placed.

member.name: P:BfshaLibrary.AnimCurve.EndFrame
member.summary: Gets or sets the last frame at which a key is placed.

member.name: P:BfshaLibrary.AnimCurve.Scale
member.summary: Gets or sets the scale to multiply values of the curve by.

member.name: P:BfshaLibrary.AnimCurve.Offset
member.summary: Gets or sets the offset to add to the values of the curve (after multiplicating them).

member.name: P:BfshaLibrary.AnimCurve.Delta
member.summary: Gets or sets the difference between the lowest and highest key value.

member.name: P:BfshaLibrary.AnimCurve.Frames
member.summary: Gets the frame numbers at which keys of the same index in the array are placed.

member.name: P:BfshaLibrary.AnimCurve.Keys
member.summary: Gets an array of elements forming the elements of keys placed at the frames of the same index in the array.

member.name: T:BfshaLibrary.AnimCurveFrameType
member.summary: Represents the possible data types in which are stored. For simple library use, they are always converted them to and from instances.

member.name: F:BfshaLibrary.AnimCurveFrameType.Single
member.summary: The frames are stored as instances.

member.name: F:BfshaLibrary.AnimCurveFrameType.Decimal10x5
member.summary: The frames are stored as instances.

member.name: F:BfshaLibrary.AnimCurveFrameType.Byte
member.summary: The frames are stored as instances.

member.name: T:BfshaLibrary.AnimCurveKeyType
member.summary: Represents the possible data types in which are stored. For simple library use, they are always converted them to and from instances.

member.name: F:BfshaLibrary.AnimCurveKeyType.Single
member.summary: The keys are stored as instances.

member.name: F:BfshaLibrary.AnimCurveKeyType.Int16
member.summary: The keys are stored as instances.

member.name: F:BfshaLibrary.AnimCurveKeyType.SByte
member.summary: The keys are stored as instances.

member.name: T:BfshaLibrary.AnimCurveType
member.summary: Represents the type of key values stored by this curve. This also determines the number of required elements to define a key in the array. Use the method to retrieve the number of elements required for the of that curve.

member.name: F:BfshaLibrary.AnimCurveType.Cubic
member.summary: The curve uses cubic interpolation. 4 elements of the array form a key.

member.name: F:BfshaLibrary.AnimCurveType.Linear
member.summary: The curve uses linear interpolation. 2 elements of the array form a key.

member.name: F:BfshaLibrary.AnimCurveType.BakedFloat
member.summary: 1 element of the array forms a key.

member.name: F:BfshaLibrary.AnimCurveType.StepInt
member.summary: 1 element of the array forms a key.

member.name: F:BfshaLibrary.AnimCurveType.BakedInt
member.summary: 1 element of the array forms a key.

member.name: F:BfshaLibrary.AnimCurveType.StepBool
member.summary: 1 element of the array forms a key.

member.name: F:BfshaLibrary.AnimCurveType.BakedBool
member.summary: 1 element of the array forms a key.

member.name: F:BfshaLibrary.AnimConstant.AnimDataOffset
member.summary: Gets or sets the memory offset relative to the start of the corresponding animation data structure to animate the field stored at that address. Note that enums exist in the specific animation which map offsets to names.

member.name: T:BfshaLibrary.Decimal10x5

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Gets the number of instances stored.

member.summary: Returns the key given is within range of the dictionary.

member.name: M:BfshaLibrary.ResDict.IndexOf(System.String)
member.summary: Searches for the specified and returns the zero-based index of the first occurrence within the entire dictionary.
member.param: The instance to locate in the dictionary. The value can be null.
member.returns: The zero-based index of the first occurence of within the entire dictionary if found; otherwise -1.

member.name: M:BfshaLibrary.ResDict.Clear
member.summary: Removes all elements from the dictionary.

member.name: P:BfshaLibrary.ResDict.Nodes
member.summary: Returns only the publically visible nodes, excluding the root node.

member.name: T:BfshaLibrary.ResDict.Node
member.summary: Represents a node forming the Patricia trie of the dictionary.

member.summary: Represents extension methods for instances.

member.name: M:BfshaLibrary.Core.ByteExtensions.Decode(System.Byte,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns an instance represented by the given number of , starting at the .
member.param: The first bit of the encoded value.
The number of least significant bits which are used to store the value.

member.name: M:BfshaLibrary.Core.ByteExtensions.EnableBit(System.Byte,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the current with the bit at the set (being 1).
member.param: The 0-based index of the bit to enable.
member.returns: The current with the bit enabled.

member.name: M:BfshaLibrary.Core.ByteExtensions.Encode(System.Byte,System.Byte,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the current with the given set into the given number of starting at .
member.param: The first bit used for the encoded value.
The number of bits which are used to store the value.
member.returns: The current with the value encoded into it.

member.name: M:BfshaLibrary.Core.ByteExtensions.DisableBit(System.Byte,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the current with the bit at the cleared (being 0).
member.param: The 0-based index of the bit to disable.
member.returns: The current with the bit disabled.

member.name: M:BfshaLibrary.Core.ByteExtensions.GetBit(System.Byte,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a value indicating whether the bit at the in the current is enabled or disabled.
member.param: The 0-based index of the bit to check.
member.returns: true when the bit is set; otherwise false.

member.name: M:BfshaLibrary.Core.ByteExtensions.RotateBits(System.Byte,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the current with all bits rotated in the given , where positive directions rotate left and negative directions rotate right.
member.param: The direction in which to rotate, where positive directions rotate left.
member.returns: The current with the bits rotated.

member.name: M:BfshaLibrary.Core.ByteExtensions.SetBit(System.Byte,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns the current with the bit at the enabled or disabled, according to .
member.param: The 0-based index of the bit to enable or disable.
true to enable the bit; otherwise false.
member.returns: The current with the bit enabled or disabled.

member.name: M:BfshaLibrary.Core.ByteExtensions.ToggleBit(System.Byte,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the current with the bit at the enabled when it is disabled or disabled when it is enabled.
member.param: The 0-based index of the bit to toggle.
member.returns: The current with the bit toggled.
